FrageText.de: Welche Arten von Reifen kennen Sie?
FrageText.en: What types of tires are you acquainted with?

en.Text: There are radial and cross-ply tires
There are winter - (M&S-) and studded tires (M&SE)

hr.Text: Postoje gume u kojima je u sastavu pola kaučuk
Postoje zimske gume (M&S-) i zimske gume s čavlima (M&SE)

sl.Text: Obstajajo zimske pnevmatike - (M&S) in pnevmatike z žebljički (M&SE)
